Label: LoyalAbility_Dec
String: Leaders all have +10 Loyalty and cost 25% less to recruit. +5 Cultural Points when a Leader is assigned to a Command Ship.

Label: Event_AncientWormhole_Bonus_Dec_0X1F4CD
String: Wormhole Generator artifact goes to the vault.

Label: CITIZEN_DESCRIPTION_PRETEXT_NO_TRAITS_Option0_0
String: Consider one of a number of terrestrial and extraterrestrial factions that are rivals in a galactic scale race to dominate space. They are described as follows: {PLAYERFACTIONDESCRIPTION:1}.

Label: CITIZEN_BIOLOGY_PROMPT_Option0_0
String: Based on this short description, which of the following biologies seems more applicable. '''1. Terrestrial Carbon based life; 2. Aquatic based life; 3. Silicon based life; 4. Robotic or Synthetic; 5. Ammonia based life''' As an example, any bipedal or quadrapedal animal would be '''1''', any fish or other sea-life would be '''2''', any partially electronic beings would be '''3''', any fully manufactured beings would be '''4''', and any gaseous being would be '''5'''. Output only a number with no commentary.

Label: CITIZEN_DESCRIPTION_PROMPT_Option0_0
String: Based on this short description, output a creative two sentence description of the citizens of this species. Remember, the description is of the citizens not of the civilization.

Label: CITIZEN_SPECIES_CATEGORY_PROMPT_Option0_0
String: Based on this short description, choose one of the following that best describes the species that would represent them in the context of a sci-fi universe. Now choose which species best describes them: '''1. Humans; 2. Elves. 3; Humanoid cats; 4. Felines such as tigers; 5. Robots; 6. Vampires; 7. Dragons; 8. Birds; 9. Amphibians; 10. Dogs; 11. Insects; 12. Crystal; 13. Trees; 14. Reptiles; 15. Demons; 16. Beautiful women; 17. Humanoid; 18. Dwarves; 19. Cyborg; 20. Plants; 21. Zombies; 22. Something else.''' Consider the description as being more important than the traits. If the description mentions a member of a given species, use that species. For example '''Drake''' indicates '''Dragons'''; '''Ant''' indicates '''Insects''', '''Canary''' indicates '''Birds'''. Only Silicon or Synthetic lifeforms can be Robots. Remember only output a single number with NO COMMENTARY or other text.

Label: Hotspot_ConqueringPlanetsDec
String: All colonized planets have a [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] Planetary Defense rating. This represents how defended a planet is and how much military might it will take to overcome its defenses. [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] have a [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating, representing how equipped they are to besiege a planet. Some ships, like Transport ships, are better equipped to Conquer planets than others.[BR][BR]To initiate a siege, issue a [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS] command to a [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] with the target being the Planet to conquer. When the [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] reaches the Planet, it will initiate a siege if its [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Rating is high enough to overcome the Planet's [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] Defense Rating.

Label: Trait_Kindness_Dec
String: [I]Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, we cannot survive.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight] Permanent bonus to Approval based on Pacifism Cultural Awareness[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight] +1 Diplomacy[/COLOR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]3 Constructor ships join you[/COLOR]

Label: MasterTech_Warfare_ShortDec
String: Allows adding weapons to our ships.

Label: MasterTech_Warfare_Dec
String: Allows adding weapons to our ships.

Label: MasterTheCallingTech_ShortDec
String: Allows the Krynniac Temple to upgrade to the Krynniac Mission.

Label: MasterTheOrderTech_ShortDec
String: Allows the Krynniac Mission to upgrade to the Krynniac Order and construction of the Krynniac Sanctuary.

Label: MasterThePathofShadows_ShortDec
String: Allows construction of the Temple of Whispers.

Label: MasterTech_AsteroidMining_ShortDec
String: Allows us to start building Asteroid Miners that boost our world's manufacturing.

Label: MasterTech_KineticDischargeMiniaturization_ShortDec
String: A variation on railguns and gauss cannons, using magnetic coils for projectile acceleration.

Label: MasterTech_MassManipulation_Dec
String: A breakthrough in particle sciences has enabled us to disrupt the Higghs field via projectiles which are are arguably massless, at least until a quantum chain reaction decays to a certain point. By mixing these particles with conventional matter, we can fire practically wafer-thin projectiles which become far heavier on the way to their target.

Label: MasterTech_MissilePayloadOptimization_ShortDec
String: Enhance missile efficacy with Matadrox component integration.

Label: MasterTech_AdaptiveMissileSystem_ShortDec
String: Elevate missile intelligence with Fury Missile Enhancements.

Label: MasterTech_ImprovedMissileProduction_ShortDec
String: Refine tactics with the Cerberus Warhead Ensemble's multi-target capabilities.

Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_ShortDec
String: Maximize destruction with advanced Antimatter Detonation techniques.

Label: MasterTech_AntimatterDetonation_Dec
String: Antimatter Detonation technology harnesses the universe's most potent energy source, allowing for unprecedented destructive power. By annihilating matter upon contact, this tech offers a leap in missile warfare, ensuring that our payloads deliver cataclysmic damage with unparalleled efficiency. A game-changer in strategic offense.

Label: Chaff_Dec
String: Reduces damage done by [ICON=MissileAttackIcon] Missile Attacks.

Label: CarrierModule_Dec
String: Carries 4 Fast and deadly Assault Fighters

Label: FrigateModule_Dec
String: A special module required in order to enable Frigate class ships.

Label: PresetCategory_Fighter_Dec
String: Fighter Category ships are Tiny Hull vessels that have increased [HS=HS_PointDefense]Evasion[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Bomber_Dec
String: Bomber Category ships are Tiny Hull vessels that deal increased Damage.

Label: PresetCategory_Frigate_Dec
String: Frigate Category ships are Small Hull vessels that have increased [HS=HS_Accuracy]Accuracy[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Cruiser_Dec
String: Cruiser Category ships are Medium Hull vessels that have increased Weapon Range.

Label: PresetCategory_Battleship_Dec
String: Battleship Category ships are Large Hull vessels that have increased [HS=HS_ArmorRating]Armor[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Dreadnought_Dec
String: Dreadnought Category ships are Huge Hull vessels that have increased [HS=HS_ShieldStrength]Shield Strength[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Siege_Dec
String: Siege Category ships are Small Hull vessels that have an increased Conquest Rating.

Label: PresetCategory_Invader_Dec
String: Invader Category ships are Cargo Hull vessels that have a highly increased Conquest Rating.

Label: ProximaCentauriSystem_Dec
String: The home system of the exiled Terran Resistance. It contains a class 23 [HS=HS_MountainousWorld]Mountainous[/HS] world and a single small world.

Label: STATDEC_PlanetaryDefense
String: [HS=HS_PlanetaryDefense]Planetary Defense[/HS] [HS=HS_Improvement]Improvements[/HS] increase a Colony's ability to resist Invasion and extend how long it takes an invading [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleet[/HS] to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the Colony.

Label: STATDEC_ResistanceBonus
String: Resistance measures how resilient a Colony is to foreign [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS]. A higher Resistance will cause it to take longer for a Colony to rebel when in another Civilization's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS].

Label: STATDEC_PlanetaryDefensesHP
String: A rating of how powerful the Colony's defenses are. Higher [HS=HS_PlanetaryDefense]Planetary Defenses[/HS] cause Invasions to take more [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] and require [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] to have higher [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Ratings to try to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the Colony.

Label: STATDEC_PlanetaryDefensesMaxHP
String: A rating of how powerful the Colony's defenses are. Higher [HS=HS_PlanetaryDefense]Planetary Defenses[/HS] cause Invasions to take more [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] and require [HS=HS_Fleet]Fleets[/HS] to have higher [ICON=Conquest_Icon] Conquest Ratings to try to [HS=HS_ConqueringPlanets]Conquer[/HS] the Colony.

Label: GROWTH_TOOLTIP_DESCRIPTION
String: Growth comes from the non-synthetic citizens on your world. Planetary Improvements and Citizen Roles can be leveraged to increase Growth. However, Growth can also be significantly decreased on worlds with high pollution.

Label: ALERT_BesiegedPlanet
String: Our planet {PLANETNAME} is under siege, and will fall in {AMOUNT} months.

Label: Unit_Entrepreneur_Dec
String: Entrepreneurs provide boost a world's [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] based on their Social trait.

Label: Unit_Entrepreneur2_Dec
String: Economists provide [HS=HS_TradeLicensesMax]Trade Licenses[/HS] as well as boost a world's [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] based on their Social and [HS=Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] based on their Diligence.

Label: WarAims_BorderSkirmish_Desc
String: A short-term war with the intent to preempt aggression and protect borders. Declaring a War of Defense carries minor diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_AggressiveNeighbor]Aggressive Neighbor[/HS]

Label: WarAims_WarOfExpansion_Desc
String: A moderate-length war with the intent to expand borders and spread influence. Declaring a War of Expansion results in diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_DangerousNeighbor]Dangerous Neighbor[/HS]

Label: WarAims_WarOfConquest_Desc
String: A long-term war with the intent to claim vast expanses of enemy territory. Declaring a War of Conquest comes with harsher diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_GalacticThreat]Galactic Threat[/HS]

Label: WarAims_WarOfAnnihilation_Desc
String: A prolonged war with the intent to wipe out the enemy civilization. Declaring a War of Annihilation will carry severe diplomatic penalties.[BR][BR]Gain [HS=HS_ClearAndPresentDanger]Clear and Present Danger[/HS]

Label: Hotspot_WeaponCooldown_Desc
String: Weapon Cooldown is the time it takes for a weapon to rearm. It measures the number of Turns in combat between shots. Reducing Weapon Cooldown allows a weapon to fire more frequently.

Label: Tactic_Format_LiberateDescription
String: Create splinter faction, with {VALUE} [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS] for {DURATION} Months

Label: InvasionTactic_PlanetaryAssault_Description
String: Follow general siege protocol to wear down the planet and eventually exert a total claim over the planet. Siege protocol focuses on minimizing casualties and collateral damage.

Label: InvasionTactic_OrbitalBombardment_Description
String: Use ship-mounted artillery to wreak havoc and destruction across the planet. The devastation caused by an orbital bombardment makes a world easier to conquer at the cost of favor and infrastructure.

Label: InvasionTactic_Propaganda_Description
String: Employ psychological and media tactics to win the hearts and minds of the populace. Slowly bring the citizenry to accept their change in ownership, preserving morale, life, and infrastructure.

Label: InvasionTactic_BiologicalAttacks_Description
String: Use genetically engineered pathogens targeted at the citizenry. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but make the planet less inhabitable by organic life.

Label: InvasionTactic_EMPAttacks_Description
String: Use targeted EMP bursts to disrupt production and damage synthetic citizens. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but slow down manufacturing and damage tech.

Label: InvasionTactic_ShatterAttacks_Description
String: Use target frequencies that cause physical damage to silicon-based lifeforms. Facilitate a faster invasion without damaging the existing infrastructure but damaging the planet's raw materials.

Label: InvasionTactic_SurfaceInvasions_Description
String: Put units on the planet's surface to conduct an invasion. Units can minimize infrastructure damage, but the ensuing battles will cost some lives and those that survive will take longer to adapt to new authority.

Label: InvasionTactic_AnnihilateTargets_Description
String: Show no mercy. Unleash all havoc upon the planet. Bombard it with artillery and send in the troops to eliminate resistance. Use efficiency and brutality to ensure nothing of the enemy remains at the end of the siege.

Label: InvasionTactic_Liberate_Description
String: Bring freedom to the people. Carefully choose targets and utilize propaganda tactics to revoke the authority of the current owner. The planet will not be conquered but instead will be allowed to become its own faction.

Label: MasterTech_Weapons_ShortDec
String: Allows adding weapons to our ships.

Label: MasterTech_Weapons_Dec
String: Allows adding weapons to our ships.

Label: MasterTech_Defense_ShortDec
String: Allows adding defenses to our ships.

Label: MasterTech_Defense_Dec
String: Allows adding defenses to our ships.

Label: MasterTech_Conquest_ShortDec
String: Allows the invasion of other worlds.

Label: MasterTech_Conquest_Dec
String: Allows the invasion of other worlds.

Label: MasterTech_ExperimentalWeapons_ShortDec
String: Frontiers in armament technology and materials science.

Label: MasterTech_ExperimentalWeapons_Dec
String: By harnessing the latest in quantum computing and nanomaterials, 'Experimental Weapons' offers a leap forward in armaments, enabling the creation of devices with unprecedented destructive capability and precision. This technology not only pushes the boundaries of known physics but also opens up new strategies in warfare, ensuring that our fleets hold the upper hand in any encounter.

Label: MasterTech_AssaultShuttles_Dec
String: The advent of Assault Shuttles marks a new era in tactical warfare, offering unmatched speed and agility for deploying troops directly into the heart of enemy territory. These advanced crafts are designed for quick strikes and fast extractions, enabling our forces to dominate space-to-ground engagements.

Label: MasterTech_IonWeapons_ShortDec
String: Advanced armaments that destabilize at the molecular level.

Label: MasterTech_IonWeapons_Dec
String: Ion Weapons technology harnesses highly charged particles to disrupt enemy systems and infrastructure. By striking targets with beams of ions, these weapons can penetrate shields more effectively than conventional arms, causing internal damage that is both swift and devastating.

Label: MasterTech_ExoticEnergies_ShortDec
String: Harnessing the unknown for advanced power applications.

Label: MasterTech_ExoticEnergies_Dec
String: Exotic Energies technology represents a breakthrough in the understanding and application of energy forms beyond the standard spectrum. This advancement allows for the creation of weapons, shields, and power sources with capabilities far exceeding current limits, opening new avenues for exploration, defense, and warfare.

Label: MasterTech_TimeDilationWeapons_Dec
String: Time Dilation Weapons leverage the manipulation of time to disorient and neutralize opponents. By creating localized fields where time flows at a dramatically altered rate, these weapons can effectively incapacitate enemy forces, equipment, and defenses, providing a significant advantage in any conflict scenario.

Label: MasterTech_CloakingDevices_Dec
String: Cloaking Devices represent a pinnacle in stealth technology, enabling ships and structures to become virtually invisible to the naked eye and radar detection. This tech not only provides a strategic advantage in evading enemy surveillance and attacks but also opens up new possibilities for reconnaissance and surprise maneuvers, fundamentally altering the dynamics of warfare and espionage.

Label: MasterTech_TheronicWeaponry_ShortDec
String: Harnessing thermo-nuclear reactions for unparalleled destruction.

Label: MasterTech_TheronicWeaponry_Dec
String: Theronic Weaponry integrates advanced thermo-nuclear fusion processes to create weapons of unprecedented power. This technology allows for the construction of arms that can unleash devastating energy blasts, capable of annihilating entire fleets or obliterating planetary defenses in a single strike, marking a new era in warfare technology.

Label: MasterTech_NaniteDefenseSystems_Dec
String: Nanite Defense Systems utilize swarms of microscopic robots to protect and repair spacecraft and infrastructure. These nanites can quickly respond to breaches, structural damage, or incoming projectiles, offering a dynamic and adaptive layer of defense that significantly enhances survivability in the face of enemy aggression.

Label: MasterTech_NeutronWeapons_ShortDec
String: Enables the distortion of subspace reducing enemy targeting abilities.

Label: MasterTech_NeutronWeapons_Dec
String: Neutron Manipulation marks a significant leap forward in strategic warfare, utilizing neutron emission to inflict maximum interference on enemy sensor equipment. This precision makes them particularly effective in neutralizing targets where the goal is to get close before striking. If they can't hit you, you can get closer.

Label: MasterTech_DamageReflection_ShortDec
String: Turn the tide by using enemy forces against them.

Label: MasterTech_DamageReflection_Dec
String: Damage Reflection technology represents a paradigm shift in defensive capabilities, enabling the absorption and redirection of incoming energy attacks back towards the aggressor. This not only provides a robust layer of protection but also introduces a psychological deterrent, as adversaries must now consider the potential repercussions of their assaults being turned against them.

Label: MasterTech_Shocktroopers_ShortDec
String: Elite troops for boarding enemy starships.

Label: MasterTech_Shocktroopers_Dec
String: Shocktroopers are the vanguard of modern interstellar warfare, equipped with heavy-duty armor and cutting-edge weaponry designed for rapid starship assault and breaching operations. Trained to operate in any environment, these elite units specialize in delivering a decisive first strike, overwhelming enemy defenses with sheer firepower and tenacity.

Label: MasterTech_BiologicalTargeting_ShortDec
String: Precision weaponry tailored to enemy vulnerabilities.

Label: MasterTech_BiologicalTargeting_Dec
String: Biological Targeting technology revolutionizes warfare by enabling the development of weapons systems that can identify and exploit the specific biological weaknesses of different alien species. This approach allows for unprecedented efficiency in combat, minimizing collateral damage and ensuring that engagements are as brief as they are decisive.

Label: MasterTech_DesperateMeasures_Dec
String: In the face of overwhelming threats to our civilization's very existence, Desperate Measures encompasses the development and deployment of extreme weapons. These are designed without regard for the usual constraints of warfare, targeting alien species indiscriminately to ensure survival at any cost. Such weapons are a testament to the dire situations that necessitate their creation, marking a dark chapter in the annals of interstellar conflict.

Label: MasterTech_Logistics_ShortDec
String: Optimizing supply chains for maximum efficiency.

Label: MasterTech_Logistics_Dec
String: Logistics technology represents a comprehensive approach to managing the flow of resources, personnel, and information across vast interstellar distances. By integrating advanced AI algorithms, predictive analytics, and real-time monitoring systems, this advancement ensures that our supply chains are optimized for efficiency, resilience, and adaptability, enabling our civilization to thrive in the face of logistical challenges.

Label: CommandModule_Dec
String: A special module required in order to enable Command Ship class ships.

Label: CorvetteModule_Dec
String: A special module required in order to enable Corvette class ships.

Label: DestroyerModule_Dec
String: A special module required in order to enable Destroyer class ships.

Label: CarriershipModule_Dec
String: A special module required in order to enable Carrier class ships.

Label: IonGun_Dec
String: TM and E ltd. EN-4211 Targeted Ionized Delivery System.[BR][BR]Fires an ionized blast of energy to disable a target's [HS=HS_PointDefense]Evasion[/HS] capabilities.

Label: TimeDilator_Dec
String: GravLabs Project 328 "The Time Dilator."[BR][BR]Uses intense bursts of gravitation to warp time dilation in a localized area to halt the cooldown of a target's weapons, resulting in a significantly reduced rate of fire.

Label: CloakingDevice_Dec
String: TM and E ltd. MI-4335 Acquisition Disruption System.[BR][BR]Deploys a combination of visual and instrument manipulation to cloak the equipped ship, rendering the ship un-targetable by enemy weapons.

Label: NeutronScrambler_Dec
String: GravLabs Project 152 "The Neutron Scrambler."[BR][BR]Excites the particles around a target to reduce the target's [HS=HS_Accuracy]Accuracy[/HS].

Label: TheronRay_Dec
String: Radiates a beam that disorients targets to such a degree it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_CarbonBased]Carbon Based[/HS] lifeforms.

Label: ShatteringPulse_Dec
String: Emits signals that disorient targets to such a degree that it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_SiliconBased]Silicon Based[/HS] lifeforms.

Label: UVField_Dec
String: Produces emissions that disorient targets to such a degree that it causes them to take increased damage. Only affects [HS=HS_AmmoniaBased]Ammonia Based[/HS] lifeforms.

Label: VampireModule_Dec
String: Meridoc Vampire Module.[BR][BR] Enhances the functionality of all weapons on the equipped ship, allowing damage done to targets to be absorbed and converted into repairs for the equipped ship.

Label: ShieldBubble_Dec
String: Provides shielding to the equipped ship's allies. At the start of combat, the Shield Bubble ensures all ships in fleet have a shield at least as strong as a percentage of the equipped ship's shield strength. Ships with stronger shields are unaffected.

Label: RepairNaniteCloud_Dec
String: VTE Specialized Nanotech var. Repair.[BR][BR]A housing unit that produces a dense grouping of nanite drones that will repair structural damage. When an ally within range is damaged in combat, Repair Nanites will be released to repair the damage and restore some of the ship's [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS].

Label: Reflector_Dec
String: Reduces the damage done by [ICON=BeamAttackIcon] Beam Attacks.

Label: EWeb_Dec
String: Reduces the damage done by [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] Kinetic Attacks.

Label: AssaultShuttles_Dec
String: Short-range transport shuttles that allow Assault Marines to board hostile vessels. Assault Marines specialize in close-quarters combat associated with battles on ships. When Assault Marines successfully board and wipe out a ship, they claim the ship for the civilization, changing its ownership.

Label: MarineModule_Dec
String: Berthing units give housing and space to Defense Marines, which helps resist the boarding actions of hostile units. Defense Marines make it much harder for enemies to take over a ship.

Label: NuclearWarhead_Dec
String: Celestitech E-53 "Atomic Devastator" Nuclear Warhead.[BR][BR]A missile-propelled warhead that delivers a nuclear payload with a distinctive damage profile.

Label: SuperHeatedPlasmaLauncher_Dec
String: Westinghouse M1K Crude Plasma Pod.[BR][BR]Launches sprays of unrestrained plasma at short range with a distinctive damage profile.

Label: RipperNaniteCloud_Dec
String: VTE Specialized Nanotech var. Ripper.[BR][BR]A dense grouping of nanites used to cause tear and cut at the external structure of a ship with a distinctive damage profile.

Label: CausticWasteThrower_Dec
String: Nurgit Weaponized Waste Recycler.[BR][BR]Releases a liquid-like compound of caustic waste that burns through a ship's hull with a distinctive damage profile.

Label: HeatArray_Dec
String: Walther B-9 Energy Transfer System.[BR][BR]Focuses radiation that causes heat to build up on a target, which can warp a ship's structure with a distinctive damage profile.

Label: NapalmInfusedPlasma_Dec
String: General Destruction Vacuum Resilient Napalm.[BR][BR]A mixture of plasma and napalm that produces a burning plasma that thrives in a vacuum and has a devastating and distinctive damage profile.

Label: MassGravityDriver_Dec
String: Copeland Industries Weaponized Mass Driver.[BR][BR]Launches magnetized projectiles at high speeds that warp gravity around them and have a distinctive damage profile.

Label: PrototypeRailgun_Dec
String: Arsenal Prototype 117.[BR][BR]A variation of the Railgun that utilizes experimental (often unsafe) technology and ammunition with very poor accuracy which results in a distinctive damage profile.

Label: CloseRangeTurrets_Dec
String: General Destruction Self-Defense Turrets.[BR][BR]A series of hull-mounted turrets that can hammer a target's hull with a small caliber fire. They only work at incredibly close range and do very little damage, but they can give a ship an edge in a hectic fight.

Label: LeadBarrier_Dec
String: Greatly reduces the damage done by Nuclear weapons.

Label: CoolingArmor_Dec
String: Reduces the damage done by Super-Heated Plasma.

Label: EMPShield_Dec
String: Prevents the damage done by Nanite attacks.

Label: LayeredHullPlating_Dec
String: Greatly reduces the damage done by Caustic weapons.

Label: ReflectivePlating_Dec
String: Reduces the damage done by Heat.

Label: ExternalFoamExtinguishers_Dec
String: Negates any damage done by Napalm.

Label: GravityCorrector_Dec
String: Reduces the damage done by Mass projectiles.

Label: HS_Accuracy_Desc
String: Accuracy is a rating of how likely a ship is to hit a target. Higher Accuracy scores make a ship more likely to hit its target with a given attack.

Label: GluonDisintegrator_Dec
String: Astrotech M-8 "Anti-Cohesion" Gluon Beam Emitter.[BR][BR]A highly advanced beam weapon that unravels molecular bonds using targeted gluon disturbances. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

Label: GluonCapacitation_Dec
String: Astrotech M-8o "Anti-Cohesion" Gluon Beam Emitter.[BR][BR]Enhances beam weapons by increasing their gluon energy storage and discharge capacity. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

Label: DisruptorPulseArray_Dec
String: Walther Va-2 Disruptor Unit[BR][BR]A weapon system that emits powerful pulses capable of disrupting atomic and subatomic structures. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

Label: Phasors_Dec
String: Westinghouse P5KA4 advanced phased energy weapon system.[BR][BR]High-intensity energy beams with precise targeting. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

Label: EnhancedPhasors_Dec
String: Westinghouse P5KA4 mk2 advanced phased energy weapon system.[BR][BR]Advanced phasors with improved beam intensity and efficiency. [HS=HS_BeamWeapon]Beam weapons[/HS] provide moderate damage at a reasonable manufacturing cost.

Label: CoilAcceleratorArray_Dec
String: Arsenal Mk XIX rapid-fire railgun.[BR][BR]Rapid-fire kinetic weapon that accelerates projectiles to high velocities. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: NeutoniumPiercerManifest_Dec
String: General Destruction Neutonium Piercer Mk I.[BR][BR]Utilizes dense neutronium to pierce through the toughest armors. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: NeutroniumEmitterCannons_Dec
String: General Destruction Neutronium Cannon Mk I.[BR][BR]Emits high-density neutronium projectiles for massive kinetic impact. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: EnhancedNeutroniumCannon_Dec
String: General Destruction Neutronium Cannon Mk I.[BR][BR]Advanced cannon that maximizes neutronium projectile effectiveness and speed. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: GravitonVortexArray_Dec
String: Copeland Industries "Vortex" Array.[BR][BR]Generates a controlled graviton field to create destructive vortexes. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: EnhancedGravitonVortexArray_Dec
String: Copeland Industries Enhanced "Vortex" Array.[BR][BR]Amplifies graviton vortex generation for increased kinetic impact. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: QuantumCatapult_Dec
String: Meridoc "Quantum" Catapult MK-IV.[BR][BR]Utilizes quantum mechanics to launch projectiles with unparalleled velocity and impact. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: HiggsFieldCrusher_Dec
String: Meridoc Higgs Field Manipulator.[BR][BR]Disrupts the Higgs field to momentarily increase target mass and induce catastrophic collapse. [HS=HS_KineticWeapon]Kinetic Weapons[/HS] combine high damage with a high Manufacturing cost.

Label: Missile_CerberusWarheads_Dec
String: Sandrala "Cerberus" Complex Missile.[BR][BR]Missiles with complex multi-layered warheads capable of inflicting cascading damage.[HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_LeviathanTorpedoes_Dec
String: Sandrala "Leviathan" Medium Torpedo.[BR][BR]The Leviathan torpedo uses a shaped antimatter warhead and delivery system to devastate the enemy. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_FuriousLeviathanTorpedoes_Dec
String: Sandrala "Furious Leviathan" Medium HE Torpedo.[BR][BR]The Leviathan Torpedo upgraded with weight redistributed to deliver High Explosive antimatter variant warheads. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_IcarionMissileCluster_Dec
String: Raytheonix "Icarion" Cluster Missile System.[BR][BR]The Icarion missile system uses volleys of antimatter-infused missiles to spread the damage across the enemy's hull. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_OrionsSpear_Dec
String: The "Orion's Spear" Missile Deployment System.[BR][BR]The Orion's Spear system is a devastating single-target missile launcher that utilizes antimatter to shatter through enemy defenses. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_TritonsRevenge_Dec
String: GH-32 specialized.[BR][BR]Built upon the original Triton Torpedo design, Triton's Revenge uses antimatter and increased missile guidance to better focus its damage. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: Missile_KleinsDread_Dec
String: Raytheonix Mk 65 "Dread" Torpedos[BR][BR]Klein's Dread torpedos strain against the fabric of space-time to quickly deliver destruction to the enemy. [HS=HS_MissileWeapon]Missile weapons[/HS] are slightly weaker in battle but can be used to attack enemy fleets at range.

Label: PresetCategory_Corvette_Dec
String: Corvette Category ships are Small Hull vessels that have increased [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Destroyer_Dec
String: Destroyer Category ships are Medium Hull vessels that have decreased [HS=HS_WeaponCooldown]Weapon Cooldown[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Command_Dec
String: Command Category ships are Large Hull vessels that decrease the [HS=HS_WeaponCooldown]Weapon Cooldown[/HS] of all ships in their fleet but have reduced [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS].

Label: PresetCategory_Carrier_Dec
String: Carrier Category ships are Huge Hull vessels that bring additional [HS=HS_FighterCategory]Fighters[/HS] and [HS=HS_BomberCategory]Bombers[/HS] into Battles.

Label: OperationalAbility_GiantSlayer_Desc
String: +50% Attack Against Large and Huge [HS=HS_HullSize]Hull[/HS] Ships

Label: STATDESC_BattleRating_SpecComp
String: The combat rating of components with unique and specialized offensive capabilities.

Label: STATDESC_BattleRating_DefOnly
String: Combination of weapon power, fire rates, ranges, defense capabilities, and hit point capacity, indicating general battle effectiveness.[BR][BR]This variant of the modifier only applied when weapons are present.

Label: STATDESC_WarWeariness
String: Your citizens grow weary of being at war for so long.

Label: STATDESC_AssaultAttack
String: A measure of how many assault troops are available. Assault troops are used to take over vessels. Assault Attack Troops can be countered with Assault Defense Troops.

Label: STATDESC_AssaultDefense
String: A measure of how many defense troops are available. Defense troops defend vessels from boarding actions, preventing ships from being taken over. Assault Defense Troops are used to counter Assault Attack Troops.

Label: STATDESC_AssaultRange
String: The effective range of assault shuttles. The Assault Range is how far assault shuttles can travel to another ship to initiate a boarding action.

Label: TestEvent_WarAim_Underdog_Dec
String: You are losing the war, but a band of privateers think that you have a good cause and have offered to help.  What do you ask them for?

Label: BUILD_FREIGHTER_LABEL
String: Construct a freighter and send it to an ally's planet to establish a trade route.

Label: ALERT_BesiegedPlanet_Invading
String: Our siege of {PLANETNAME} will complete in {AMOUNT} months.

Label: ALERT_SiegeInterrupted
String: The siege of {PLANETNAME} has been interrupted!

Label: TradeButtonTooltip
String: Trade Routes[BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]View your civilization's trade routes.[/COLOR]

Label: SuperNova_NOTRADEROUTES
String: [B]Trade Routes[/B][BR][COLOR=BrightRed]You don't have any trade routes.[/COLOR]

Label: Commands_Shipyard_Sending_Go_String
String: All [COLOR=Red]Shipyards[/COLOR] sending to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight] {OBJECTNAME:1} [/COLOR] should send to [COLOR=Green]{OBJECTNAME:2}[/COLOR].

Label: Commands_Ships_Of_Type_String
String: All [COLOR=Red]Ships[/COLOR] of type [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]{OBJECTNAME:1}[/COLOR] should go to [COLOR=Green]{OBJECTNAME:2}[/COLOR].

Label: Commands_Ships_Go_String
String: All [COLOR=Red]Ships[/COLOR] going to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]{OBJECTNAME:1}[/COLOR] should go to [COLOR=Green]{OBJECTNAME:2}[/COLOR].

Label: Commands_Fleet_String
String: All [COLOR=Red]Fleets[/COLOR] going to [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]{OBJECTNAME:1}[/COLOR] should go to [COLOR=Green]{OBJECTNAME:2}[/COLOR].

Label: Commands_Tip_Dec
String: Give civilization wide commands to to your Shipyards and Fleets

Label: Doctrine_Dec
String: The Class of your ship will determine its behavior in battle. New options can be Learned though Research and Ideology.

Label: Doctrine_Detials_Dec
String: Operational Abilities and Targeting Priorities can change a ship's behavior in combat, with different combinations resulting in noticeably different tactics.

Label: EDIT_BATTLE_CLASS_DISABLED_OVERRIDE_DEFAULTS
String: Overrides of default Classes do not persist between games but can be edited in game.

Label: NEW_BATTLE_CLASS_DISABLED_DLC_REQUIRED
String: Creating a new Class requires Warlords DLC.

Label: Population_ReservedUnits_Tooltip_Singular
String: {VALUE} citizen in transit to this planet.

Label: TradeScreenText
String: Galactic Trade can greatly contribute to your economy and help you build diplomatic relationships with your neighbors.

Label: DiplomaticMod_AggressiveNeighbor_HSDesc
String: A minor reputation gained by declaring a War of Defense that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-1 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

Label: DiplomaticMod_DangerousNeighbor_HSDesc
String: A reputation gained by declaring a War of Expansion that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-2 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

Label: DiplomaticMod_GalacticThreat_HSDesc
String: A harsh reputation gained by declaring a War of Conquest that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-3 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

Label: DiplomaticMod_ClearAndPresentDanger_HSDesc
String: A severe reputation gained by declaring a War of Annihilation that affects [HS=HS_Diplomacy]Diplomacy[/HS].[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]-4 Diplomacy with all Civilizations[/COLOR]

Label: Event_WarWeariness_8F3C_Desc
String: {LEADERNAME}, renowned for their peace advocacy, urgently contacts you. "The primary objective of our war has been achieved," they argue, "Continuing this conflict will only result in needless loss and expenditure. It's time we sought peace for the sake of all involved."

Label: Event_WarWeariness_8F3C_Choice1_Desc
String: You dismiss the plea of {LEADERNAME}, asserting that the war will continue under your discretion. "The cost is necessary for our ultimate victory," you declare, knowing this decision may strain loyalty within your ranks.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_8F3C_Choice2_Desc
String: Acknowledging the concerns of {LEADERNAME}, you pledge to initiate peace talks. "We will seek an end to this conflict," you promise, hoping to uphold your word and prevent further fallout.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_9E6Z_Desc
String: {LEADERNAME} approaches you again, their disappointment palpable. "You vowed to pursue peace, yet the conflict rages on. How many more must suffer before you act?" they implore, challenging you to fulfill your earlier promise or admit the shifting tides of war.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_9E6Z_Choice1_Desc
String: With a heavy heart, you inform {LEADERNAME} that the situation has evolved. "Our path to peace is not as clear as we hoped," you explain. "The war must go on for now." You brace yourself for the impact this will have on your people's loyalty.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_9E6Z_Choice2_Desc
String: "Your concerns are heard, and not in vain," you assure {LEADERNAME}. "We are actively seeking peace, but such negotiations require time." You hope this reassurance strengthens your cause and maintains the trust of your allies and citizens alike.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_A1B2_Desc
String: "I've defended your promises of peace, believing in your words," {LEADERNAME} confronts you, their frustration barely contained. "Yet, here we stand, farther from peace than ever. How do you justify this to those who've placed their trust in you?"

Label: Event_WarWeariness_A1B2_Choice1_Desc
String: With a sigh, you drop the facade. "Our strategy demanded it," you admit. "True peace was never an immediate option." You prepare for the fallout, knowing this confession might shatter the remaining loyalty of your closest followers.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_A1B2_Choice2_Desc
String: "Please, just a bit more patience," you plead, attempting to salvage the situation. "Negotiations are delicate, but we're on the cusp of peace." Your words are a gamble, promising an end that you must now do everything to achieve.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_Final_Desc
String: {LEADERNAME} approaches you one last time, their disappointment palpable. "I've come to realize promises are just words to you," they state coldly. "Your actions have revealed the truth of your intentions. There's nothing left to say." With that, they turn their back, marking the end of your alliance.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_Final_Choice_Desc
String: As {LEADERNAME}'s words sink in, you're left to confront the harsh reality of your choices. There's no denying the path you've chosen, and with a heavy heart, you accept the consequences. The war continues but at what cost?

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EV31_Desc
String: Amidst the current war, a message from {PLANETNAME} reaches your desk, carrying the collective unease of its people. They feel exposed, defenseless against potential threats, a sentiment amplified by the war's shadow looming over them. The plea is clear: a request to bolster their planetary defenses, if only to provide a semblance of safety and reassurance. You could also ignore their cries, leaving them to fend for themselves against the specter of insecurity.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EV31_Enhance_Desc
String: In a gesture of support, you allocate resources to construct rudimentary defense structures. While more symbolic than tactical, this act serves to lift spirits and reinforce faith in your leadership at the cost of precious Durantium.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EV31_Neglect_Desc
String: Opting to concentrate resources elsewhere, you disregard the planetary appeal. This decision, practical from a strategic standpoint, risks dampening the morale of your citizens, who must now grapple with their vulnerabilities unaided.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EU01_Desc
String: As the war trudges on, despite our strategic objectives being met, The population of {PLANETNAME} grows increasingly uneasy. The delay in peace negotiations has not gone unnoticed, stirring concerns about the future among the populace.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EU02_Desc
String: With the war's objectives seemingly achieved, the continued conflict has left {PLANETNAME} feeling particularly vulnerable. The absence of peace has sown seeds of fear and uncertainty among its citizens, affecting the colony's overall spirit.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EU03_Desc
String: Despite reaching the war's goals, the ongoing conflict has not ceased, leading to widespread exhaustion on {PLANETNAME}. The relentless pace of production to support the war effort is taking its toll on the workforce and machinery alike.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EU04_Desc
String: As the war drags past its objectives, {PLANETNAME} experiences desperation among its citizens. This desperation has manifested in an uptick in criminal activities, as many feel abandoned by the extended conflict and uncertain future.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP01_Desc
String: War profiteers have been discovered operating on {PLANETNAME}. Their presence increases criminal activities, but their removal might provoke pirate attacks nearby.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP01_Allow_Desc
String: Allow them to operate, accepting the rise in crime as a cost of their clandestine activities.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP01_DriveOff_Desc
String: Expel them, risking retaliation in the form of pirate raids near the planet.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP02_Desc
String: With the war dragging beyond its intended objectives, a pirate shipyard has emerged due to the increasing number of war profiteers in the area. Near our space, exploiting the prolonged conflict. This operation is significantly impacting the wealth of our planets, as these war profiteers intercept valuable resources meant for the economy.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP03_Desc
String: A shadow economy has flourished as the war stretches beyond its intended goals. A notorious cadre of war profiteers, emboldened by the protracted conflict, has approached your administration. They offer a simple yet morally ambiguous proposition: overlook their siphoning of resources from Starbases, and in return, they'll limit the disruption their operations could cause. Rejecting their terms may bring swift and criminal retribution, spreading fear and chaos across your planets as the war drags on.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP03_Accept_Desc
String: Reluctantly agree to the profiteers' terms, compromising to maintain a semblance of stability.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP03_Reject_Desc
String: Reject the war profiteers' offer. This decision, while morally sound, will incur their wrath.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP04_Desc
String: In the shadow of a conflict that has long outlived its strategic objectives, the inhabitants of {PLANETNAME} find themselves relying on smugglers for basic necessities. These smugglers, operating under the guise of benefactors, have inadvertently introduced a wave of criminality that threatens to engulf the planet. As desperation grows with the war's prolongation, so does the dilemma of whether to curb their activities, risking the immediate well-being of your people, or tolerate a necessary evil in exchange for survival.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP04_Ignore_Desc
String: Turn a blind eye to the smugglers' operations.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP04_CrackDown_Desc
String: Resolve to restore order and initiate a crackdown on the smugglers' network.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_WP05_Desc
String: With the war's strategic objectives long surpassed, the prolonged conflict has given rise to an unscrupulous breed of war profiteers. These opportunistic entities have infested the trade routes, leeching off the vital arteries of commerce that sustain our civilization. Their activities not only siphon off the wealth meant for reconstruction and aid but also cripple the efficiency of our trade networks, exacerbating the economic strain caused by a war that refuses to end.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EP01_Desc
String: The protracted conflict has finally boiled over into public unrest on {PLANETNAME}. Crowds gather, their voices united in protest against the continuation of a war they see as needless and wasteful. The sentiment across the planet is clear: peace should be negotiated, and further sacrifices are unacceptable.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EP01_Crackdown_Desc
String: Enforce a strict crackdown on dissenting voices.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EP01_BestInterest_Desc
String: Reassure the populace that their leadership is acting with their best interest in mind.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_EP01_FutureSecurity_Desc
String: Reinforce the importance of securing a stable future.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_DC04_Desc
String: While our victory on the battlefield is celebrated, the delayed peace negotiations have not gone unnoticed. Allies and neutral observers alike question the delay, hinting at a potential mistrust in our ability to lead toward a peaceful resolution.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_DC03_Desc
String: As our war efforts persist past the achievement of our goals, several galactic entities express concern over the unnecessary destruction and loss of life. Their warnings hint at a growing dissatisfaction and a potential reevaluation of diplomatic relations.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_DC02_Desc
String: Intelligence reports indicate a growing unease among our allies and neighbors. The prolongation of a conflict, already deemed won, seeds doubt in our motives. This unease threatens to strain diplomatic ties as calls for peace grow louder.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_DC01_Desc
String: Rumors have reached your ears that other civilizations are growing concerned over our prolonged conflict. Some fear that our original war goals might have been a pretext for a greater, more encompassing conflict. This could jeopardize our diplomatic relations globally.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_DC05_Desc
String: The continuation of the war, well beyond its strategic goals, isolates us on the galactic stage. Other civilizations view our actions with increasing suspicion, believing our intentions may not be as clear-cut as once thought.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_GenericLeaderPromise_Dec
String: {LeaderName} will remember your promised to seek peace.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_LE01_Desc
String: Amidst the lingering shadows of the war, a notable leader expresses concerns over the escalating stress levels among the populace. The strain of the prolonged conflict has made daily tasks and responsibilities increasingly challenging. The leader looks to you, hoping for a swift and peaceful resolution to the war's tensions.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_LE02_Desc
String: Returning with deep frustrations, the leader confronts you about the elusive promised peace. The prolonged conflict and unmet assurances have left them questioning the path ahead.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_LE03_Desc
String: A leader approaches with a heavy heart, troubled by the war's continuation beyond its intended goals. They express deep concern for the people's well-being and the growing unease among the populace. 'The weight of prolonged conflict bears down on us all,' they confide, seeking reassurance or action to mitigate the strain.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_LE04_Desc
String: Another leader comes forward, visibly stressed by the logistical nightmares spawned by the war's overextension. 'Our resources are stretched thin, and the people grow weary of unending demands,' they lament, seeking a directive to alleviate the pressure without compromising the war effort.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_LE05_Desc
String: A governor brings rumors of unrest stirring among the populace, exacerbated by the war dragging past its objectives. 'The people's patience wears thin, and the murmurs of discontent grow louder each day,' they report, seeking guidance on how to best address the burgeoning dissent.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR01_Desc
String: On {PLANETNAME}, a war prolonged beyond its objectives has given rise to anti-war rebels. Marking their opposition, they have significantly disrupted the planet's manufacturing capabilities, urging an immediate cease to hostilities. The leadership faces a crucial decision: to crack down on these activities or to publicly announce efforts to conclude the war.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR01_Choice2_Title
String: Announce an increase in peace efforts.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR02_Desc
String: Despite attempts to negotiate peace, the war lingers, emboldening the rebels on {PLANETNAME}. Their numbers swell as more join their cause, driven by disillusionment and anger. The planet stands on the brink of widespread unrest.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR03_Desc
String: In the wake of the crackdown and the continued war, the rebels on {PLANETNAME} have begun to retaliate, targeting the planet's defenses. This act of defiance not only undermines the planet's security but also strains the already limited resources.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR04_Desc
String: The rebels' unrest escalates into a full-blown riot on {PLANETNAME}, significantly impacting manufacturing, spiking crime rates, and hindering growth. The administration is now forced to navigate these tumultuous times with limited options. The rebels threaten to continue to escalate their strikes until the drawn-out war is brought to an end and peace is negotiated.

Label: Event_WarWeariness_AR05_Desc
String: The anti-war rebellion has morphed into an ongoing crisis on {PLANETNAME}. Despite efforts to quell the unrest, the riot continues unabated, further disrupting the fabric of society with no end in sight as the war lingers. The rebels refuse to give up until peace is negotiated and the war with its goals accomplished is brought to an end.
